cast.original_title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
cast.overview: Cars fly, trees fight back, and a mysterious house-elf comes to warn Harry Potter at the start of his second year at Hogwarts. Adventure and danger await when bloody writing on a wall announces: The Chamber Of Secrets Has Been Opened. To save Hogwarts will require all of Harry, Ron and Hermione’s magical abilities and courage.
cast.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

cast.original_title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
cast.overview: Harry Potter has lived under the stairs at his aunt and uncle's house his whole life. But on his 11th birthday, he learns he's a powerful wizard—with a place waiting for him at the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. As he learns to harness his newfound powers with the help of the school's kindly headmaster, Harry uncovers the truth about his parents' deaths—and about the villain who's to blame.
cast.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

cast.overview: Jackie is a divorced mother of two. Isabel is the career minded girlfriend of Jackie’s ex-husband Luke, forced into the role of unwelcome stepmother to their children. But when Jackie discovers she is ill, both women realise they must put aside their differences to find a common ground and celebrate life to the fullest, while they have the chance.
cast.title: Stepmom

crew.overview: In 1630, a farmer relocates his family to a remote plot of land on the edge of a forest where strange, unsettling things happen. With suspicion and paranoia mounting, each family member's faith, loyalty and love are tested in shocking ways.
crew.title: The Witch

crew.overview: Two lighthouse keepers try to maintain their sanity while living on a remote and mysterious New England island in the 1890s.
crew.title: The Lighthouse

also_known_as: エレナー・コロンブス
エリノア・コロンバス
details.biography: Eleanor Patricia Columbus (born October 12, 1989) is an American film producer and actress. She co-founded Maiden Voyage Pictures with her dad filmmaker Chris Columbus. She is most known for producing films such as The Witch (2015), Menashe (2017), The Lighthouse (2019), Dìdi (2024) and Nosferatu (2024).
details.name: Eleanor Columbus
